Text:
Are you fucking kidding me? Out of everything that is available, you put a 2 channel, 128 kbps audio track for a 10 GB, 1080p rip. Why?

Don't bother downloading if you care at all about audio quality.

I specifically looked down at the comments hoping to see 1 comment that mentioned the audio sucks. 

Thanks for not letting me down.

Anyone wanna check to make sure its not a typo? I didn't actually download the file to check.
